participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I've been working at my current job for three years, and I'm really happy here. I lost my job as a nurse after I was diagnosed with cancer. I am an artist from a small town in the midwest. My favorite car is the Ford Mustang. I have been cheated on by every ex-girlfriend except for one.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.background: I am a hard worker who is passionate about the ocean, and I am confident that I can make a positive impact on your company. I wear a lot of purple. I'm so good at football, my friends would be shocked to know that I hate sweet potatoes. I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection. I want to look my best, so I try to take care of my appearance.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out and watching Netflix. What about you?
Not much either, just working on a project. I'm an artist, and I'm working on a painting of a mustang.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to paint.
It's not as hard as you think! It just takes practice.
I'm sure I'd be terrible at it.
You never know until you try!
Well, maybe I'll give it a shot one of these days.
I'm sure you'd be great at it!
Thanks, I appreciate the encouragement.
No problem! So, what do you do for work?
I'm a hard worker who is passionate about the ocean, and I am confident that I can make a positive impact on your company.
That's great! What do you do for the ocean?
I work with a group that cleans up beaches and waterways. We also do research on how to protect the ocean environment.
That's really amazing! I'm so glad you're doing something to help the environment.
Thanks! I'm passionate about it, so it's really rewarding work.
I'm sure it is. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family and friends. We go to the movies a lot, and we also like to play sports together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love spending time with my family and friends too.
It's the best!
So, what's your favorite movie?
That's a tough question! I have a lot of favorites. But I think I'd have to say The Shawshank Redemption.
Oh my gosh, that's my favorite movie too!
That's awesome! It's so good.
It's so good! I've seen it like a hundred times, and it never gets old.
Me too! It's just so good.
I'm so glad we agree!
Me too
